Uses of Class
jpacman.model.Cell

Packages that use Cell
jpacman.model This package contains the pacman model: i.e., it contains representations for cells, monsters, the player, the board, the game, etc. 
 

Uses of Cell in jpacman.model
 

Methods in jpacman.model that return Cell
 Cell Cell.cellAtOffset(int dx, int dy)
          Return the cell located at position (x + dx, y + dy), or null if this cell would fall beyond the borders of the Board.

          Return the cell at position (x,y).

Methods in jpacman.model with parameters of type Cell
 boolean Cell.adjacent(Cell otherCell)
          Determine if the other cell is an immediate neighbour of the current cell.

Constructors in jpacman.model with parameters of type Cell
